Address.value: HARCOURT STREET,EUROPA HOUSE, 2ND FLOOR, DUBLIN, D02 WR20, Ireland

CompanyDescription.label: Company Description
CompanyDescription.value: James Hardie is a producer of fibre cement construction materials. Hardie predominantly serves the residential construction industry with its flagship fibre cement siding product range. The group's key segment is North America, where it derives around 70% of group earnings from the sale of fibre cement exterior siding and 10% from the sale of fibre cement interior boards. In 2021, the group acquired Fermacell, an exterior and interior products business headquartered in Germany and with operations throughout Europe.
